analysis.description:
GameOfThrones.repairTheCastle has external calls inside a loop:
	- citizensAddresses[lastCitizenPaid].send(citizensAmounts[lastCitizenPaid]) (/unique_chucks/33/0x7996d791995b9f9c15eb4c3e899b09a344c54bdb.sol#105-106)

GameOfThrones.repairTheCastle (/unique_chucks/33/0x7996d791995b9f9c15eb4c3e899b09a344c54bdb.sol#48-116) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lastCollection + TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/33/0x7996d791995b9f9c15eb4c3e899b09a344c54bdb.sol#62-116)

GameOfThrones.usurpation (/unique_chucks/33/0x7996d791995b9f9c15eb4c3e899b09a344c54bdb.sol#160-185) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- onThrone + PEACE_PERIOD <= block.timestamp && msg.value >= kingCost * 110 / 100 (/unique_chucks/33/0x7996d791995b9f9c15eb4c3e899b09a344c54bdb.sol#164-182)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/33/0x7996d791995b9f9c15eb4c3e899b09a344c54bdb.sol#158:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/33/0x7996d791995b9f9c15eb4c3e899b09a344c54bdb.sol#181:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
